Home.title: testin'
Home.intro: I'm an artist, aspiring game designer, and graduate student at Kyushu University. I <games>develop games</games>, <photos>shoot film</photos>, and <music>compose music</music> in my spare time. I've <tenjin>created games for companies</tenjin> and <hommer>taught an AI to write a movie</hommer> (before it was cool)! I'm currently researching new games accessibility tech for the visually impairedâ€”designing tools to streamline accessibility development. <work>Check out my work for more details.</work>

Tenjin.title: Tenjin Dash
Tenjin.desc: You are the controller in this high-octane race through the streets of Tenjin! Inspired by exercise-oriented game design of World Class Track Meet andWii Fit.

EnemyZero.title: Enemy Zero
EnemyZero.desc: A proof-of-concept VR remake of WARP's cult classic horror game Enemy Zero!

Beauty.title: Beauty
Beauty.desc: A globetrotting adventure exploring the myths and legends of world culture. Inspired by 2D action-adventure classics (Zelda, Mana) and modern narrative masterpieces (Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons), presented in the style of a BL romance.
